title: This jacket is pure genius
text:
Not just a jacket. Source: Supplied 
A NECK pillow. Eye mask. Gloves. Pen. 
Tired of lugging around so many items while on the road? This travel jacket design could bring you much joy. 
The BauBax jacket has made quite an impression since being listed on the crowd-funding site Kickstarter.com — receiving nearly $100,000 worth of backings so far, well above its goal of $20,000. 
It has been likened to the “Swiss Army knife” of jackets, because it contains a whopping 15 gadgets or features. It packs in a lot of uses. Source: Supplied 
Here are some of the highlights: 
• A built-in neck pillow that inflates in two seconds. That’ll make the ride a bit more comfy. Source: Supplied 
• An eye mask.
